divs: Sighting DetailsI had just left my house with my daughter to go to the grocery store. As I headed East in my car I saw something out of the corner of my eye. Up in the sky in the northeastern direction I noticed this large looking glowing orange orb that just seemed to be hovering. It was not very far up in the sky because when I continued driving down the road, the trees got in my way of seeing it. I continued to stare at the UFO in disbelief when I got back into view of it (truthfully I was in shock). When I got to the intersection in which I was turning left, more trees got into my view of the orb and I lost sight of it. However, as I began to head North and there were no more trees in my way (towards downtown DeLeon), I quickly looked to see if the orb thing was still up there but instead all I saw were what it looked to be three jets with blinking lights in the exact spot where I saw the UFO. I am still in shock that I actually saw this weird glowing object. I know from experience in the past that military aircraft often use this aerospace in this general area to practice manueavers and also, set off flares. But I promise ya'll what I saw tonight was NOT a flare. Hopefully someone else saw what I did.
trends: There have been 13 other sightings in De Leon
There were no other sightings in De Leon on or around November 6th 2008
